cisc275.group3.controller

Class ControllerOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • cisc275.group3.controller.ControllerScene
      • cisc275.group3.controller.ControllerOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ControllerOverlay
extends ControllerScene
    Responsible for creating the interface overlay buttons/labels, and adding them to the main JLayeredPane (from GameWindow.java). After the button has been added, the associated action listener and action is added.

    Author:
    Scott, Jolyne, Thomas, Ryan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControllerOverlay(int w, int h, GameWindow f, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Component> cl, int sceneType)
      Default scene controller parameters.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class cisc275.group3.controller.ControllerScene

        displayMission, displayScore

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerOverlay

        public ControllerOverlay(int w,
                         int h,
                         GameWindow f,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Component> cl,
                         int sceneType)
        Default scene controller parameters. After they are passed to super(), the menu button/label parameters are set.

        Parameters:
        w - int-scene width
        h - int-scene height
        f - GameWindow-JFrame container
        cl - HashMap-associations of scene controllers and layers
        sceneType - int-indicates how the scene should be initialized/updated 0 = empty/no update, 1 = special update (ex. tutorial HQ), 2 = standard update, 3 = menus/interfaces
